# SRApiWrapper
Info
========
An easy to use, async and sync ready, feature-rich wrapper for the API some-random-api.ml.
Copyright - (c) 2021, Nimboss#9651 (ID - 717724055217635398) on Discord, Nimboss2411 on GitHub.
API Creator - (c) 2018 - 2021, Telk#4038 (ID - 423675224395874314) on Discord, telkenes on GitHub.
License - MIT.

Links
========
URL for API - https://some-random-api.ml.
Github repository - https://github.com/Nimboss2411/SRApiWrapper.
Documentation - https://github.com/Nimboss2411/SRApiWrapper/tree/main/Documentation.
SRApi Discord server - https://discord.gg/E4HT8KTTd5.
API Keys - https://some-random-api.ml/docs/Welcome/Keys.
